LanguageData.Backstory_Yuuka.title: Hayase Yuuka
LanguageData.Backstory_Yuuka.baseDesc: Enrolled in the Millennium Science School, Yuuka is the treasurer of the student council known as "Seminar".
LanguageData.Backstory_Noa.title: Ushio Noa
LanguageData.Backstory_Noa.baseDesc: Member of the Millennium Science School, secretary of the "Seminar" student council.
LanguageData.Backstory_Rio.title: Rio
LanguageData.Backstory_Rio.baseDesc: Student President of the Millennium Science School and the Chairwoman of "Seminar".
